data.description:
Minsar Studio helps you to design interactive and engaging AR and VR experiences. Our VR studio fit with creative workflow of all range from individuals to big creative agencies. No programming skills are required. Import your work (2D, 3D, videos, sounds, etc.) from your favorite creator software or provider, then design AR & VR experiences with our revolutionary no-code features. Once you've done, Minsar Publish and Export Services allows you to share your experiences on social media, a simple browser, your favorite device, your website, or your app.

Minsar makes your AR & VR projects shine.

changelog.change_log: Minsar Studio 2.8 brings new creation features (speed factor for glTF animation Actions, Hide Reveal Toggle Action) and major UX improvements.
